There is no doubt in my mind about that. You are right April =3D) In the be=
ginning I did seek some proof for my own sanity. But time and time again I =
have learned much more than I ever expected to. For me its=A0become more th=
an about contact with my dead loved ones, its more about learning and growi=
ng from the experiences. That definitely has been the end result. 
=A0
Mist=
y

--- On Wed, 9/16/09, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombieghostresearch.c=
om> wrote:


From: April Abercrombie <april@...>
S=
ubject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Voice inflections?
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Da=
te: Wednesday, September 16, 2009, 5:14 PM


=A0 




I would definitely ca=
ll that proof. The strength of the proof is in the part that you knew nothi=
ng about what the message would mean to the person, or if it a message for =
you, it was some fact that you had not known prior.
=A0
IMO, in this case t=
here is no way it would be a case matrixing or hearing what you wanted or e=
xpected to hear, that it was real information conveyed through an intellige=
nt source.
=A0

----- Original Message ----- 
From: bulletbabea 
To: EVP-IT=
C@yahoogroups .com 
Sent: Wednesday, September 16, 2009 2:46 PM
Subject: [E=
VP-ITC] Re: Voice inflections?

=A0 

I think quite often when the message =
isn't for me and it's for someone outside of this research it matters very =
much that the message is something I myself would never know. It hits home =
so much more for the recipient. To me it may seem dumb or meaningless but t=
o the person who the message is for it can have a deeper impact because the=
y know theres no way possible I could know the info. And vice versa when th=
e message is for me sometimes the info doesnt become clear til much later d=
own the road when I learn that bit of info or watch that predictive message=
 become reality. It's all very interesting and educational =3D)

Misty

---=
 In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, "April Abercrombie" <april@...> wrote:
>
> Th=
e only way to prove 100% that something you receive through the box is auth=
entic communication, is if they say something that you can verify, somethin=
g you yourself did not know.
> 
> ----- Original Message ----- 
> From: Mis=
ty Dawn 
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
> Sent: Wednesday, September 16, 2=
009 3:41 AM
> Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Voice inflections?
> 
> 
> I have gott=
en many life like voices over the years. My first evp was my mothers voice =
and no boxes were involved. The box is a tool/method and there are many way=
s to get their voices heard. So in the different methods I have used, yes I=
 have heard voices that resemble their lifetime charachteristics and tones.=
 Is it always that way? No. 
> 
> Most often the group will speak as one vo=
ice because I have requested they do so. One voice tone will begin a senten=
ce and another will end it. So I may hear my female friends voice start off=
 a thought and an unknown male voice finish the sentence. And vice versa of=
ten they speak in tones which do not even come close to what they sounded l=
ike in life. Quite often they are spirits I didnt know in life. I may get s=
omeone saying This is edison, and then find an old recording he did where h=
e starts it off saying This is edison, but for me I do not know the man so =
there is no recognition for me. I document it and file it away as a curious=
ity.
> 
> I always laugh when people say thats not your mother or friend th=
ats something trying to fool you and mess with your head. I knew my mother =
longer than anyone and its interesting that it is easier for those people t=
o believe that its possible that something/someone else is speaking pretend=
ing to be my mother but its much harder for them to believe that quite poss=
ibly that really is my mother keeping her promise to stay in touch after de=
ath. If one is possible then so is the other. I tend to be stubborn in some=
 respects in that I dont instantly believe what anyone tells me whether liv=
ing or not. If they give me a message I think is dumb I am very reluctant t=
o pass it on and usually those are the ones that get the biggest confirmati=
ons tho it means nothing to me at the time. So yes quite possibly evp work =
can be used the same as mediumship in missing persons cases.
> 
> For me to=
ne of voice has grown to mean nothing. It is a treat when they manage to co=
me across sounding as they did when in physical form here but I look beyond=
 the tone of voice. Often people get a childs voice and they become saddene=
d by the thought that a child is earthbound. But I see it just as a represe=
ntation of voice and whether it comes across as male female child or robot =
matters little to me.
> 
> I do find they often resume the "character" they=
 played because after all that is sort of what we are, characters in some g=
iant play. Whether it is the beliefs they had which were their trademark, t=
he tone of voice, their image, or use of some nickname even I dont know abo=
ut I look at it all as just a pixel in a larger portrait that some part sur=
vives once the body has ceased to function. And the message is simply, our =
energy continues on.
> 
> Quote by Einstein: 'Energy cannot be created or d=
estroyed, it can only be changed from one form to another.'
> 
> Misty (the=
 insomniac is up way tooooo late and rambling on LOL)
> 
> --- On Tue, 9/15=
/09, mrscaptainjack2 <jjkamp@...> wrote:
> 
> 
> From: mrscaptainjack2 <jjk=
amp@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Voice inflections?
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups =
.com
> Date: Tuesday, September 15, 2009, 9:56 PM
> 
> 
> 
> I was googling=
 about AM radio reception, and I came across the below exchange on a forum.=
 It talks about using the box to find missing persons (which I didn't know =
was possible), and the conversation mentions hearing specific voice inflect=
ions and recognizing a dead person's specific voice on the box. My question=
 is, do any of you get a recognizable voice? The voices I get always sound =
robotic, although I do get clearly male or female voices. 
> 
> http://www.=
itcbridg e.com/forum/ view_topic. php?id=3D515& forum_id=3D 31
>










=
